base_description: Tall, rectangular, gray cabinet with modern style.
part_description: Includes one drawer at the top and one door below, both with simple handles. The drawer is horizontally aligned, while the door is vertically aligned. The cabinet is supported by a solid base.
internal_interaction_description: The drawer slides in and out smoothly, offering storage space. The door swings open to reveal additional storage, possibly with shelves. Both parts are designed to maximize storage efficiency within the cabinet's compact frame.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed in kitchens or bathrooms, interacting with users by providing storage for various items. Its neutral color and modern design allow it to blend with different decor styles. Handles facilitate easy opening and closing of the drawer and door.
